name: Greece
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens
languages: English widely spoken in tourist areas

about.description: Greece is a country in southeastern Europe known for its ancient history, stunning islands, and Mediterranean culture. From the Acropolis in Athens to the white-washed buildings of Santorini, Greece offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and natural beauty.

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: April to June and September to October for pleasant weather; July and August for beach holidays
culturalNotes: Dinner is typically served late (after 9 PM)
Siesta time is observed in many places
Tipping is appreciated but not mandatory
